Name: Beginning of the End
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
10 ml Lustau Oloroso Don Nuño Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (flamed).
EXPRESS a flamed orange zest twist into empty chilled glass to line the inside with smoky oils.
EXPRESS flamed lemon zest twist over cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Burnt orange oils add smoky notes, complexity and balance to this bittersweet drink. A perfect after-dinner cocktail.
History: Created in 2008 by Paul Mathew at The Hide, London, originally for the Boutique Bar Show "Free Spirit" cocktail competition. Based on the classic Fin de Siècle , but using rum in place of gin. Paul's original recipe called for: 45ml Diplomatico Reserva Exclusiva, 15ml Antica Formula, 10ml Amer Picon and Palo Cortado Viejo sherry.
